extDescription.message: This is a playlist tool to play video clips with "start~end time" directly on Youtube/Onedrive/GoogleDrive/TwitCasting.

playlistClickHint.description: Click on the list item to start the Playlist.

singerClickHint.message: Click on the list item to play his/her song!
singerClickHint.description: Click on the list item to play his song!

plTitle.description: Title of the playlist container sidebar.

widthHelp.message: Can be a plain number in px or a css value string.

heightHelp.message: Can be a plain number in px or a css value string.
heightHelp.description: Can be a plain number in px or a css value string.

playlistSourceHelp.message: Clear this field to use the default source.
playlistSourceHelp.description: Clear this field to use the default source.
